S.FORM: lava ki faät, mouroung-al-lava ki faät. Assi-kamou hmahei 'ss-al mylligh ki Alid ki Mammon-appa.

25 Alei ki anna pasousou-en-au-kamou, Ynna pæh-'kbou ki rÿh ki kæuag-hen-noumi, ka mang ta kan-nau-moumi, ka mang ta yhtau-moumi, [ynna pæh-'kbou-appa] ki vouäl-oumi, ka mang ta pammi-ei-moumi. Assi kaua masa-oun keirang-en ta kæu-ag-han ki kakan-nin? ta vouäl-appa ki pammammi-en?

26 Ararau-au ta ajajam ka sæu-æbigh tou vullum, k'assi-ah-au dmadri, k'assi-ah-au maäjam, k'assi-ah-au mallid tou kouvau; Râ pa-kan-nun-appa ta anna ki Raraman-oumi ka tou tounnoun ki vullum: Assi-kamou kana si ouro si-bavau ki anna ta ymoumi-ra?
27 Ti-mang ymoumi-æn ta pæh-'k-bou, pou-lpough pou-dima sat ka-yænah-en [ki pariou] tou ka-'angdag-an ki di'i tyn?
28 Kaumang ka pæh-'k-bou-noumi pæh-dimdim ki pammammi-an? Pouliliht-au ta seilouf ka tou pou-læh, mamei-mang ta tatatt-oul nein: assi si-ba ki na poungas, assi tmatinoun-ra.
29 Ka pasousou-en-au-ka-mou ka assi k'ma-hynna ni-pa-sih-tabung pa-pah-kissi ta ti Salomon tou
